comment:
There isn‚Äôt anything funny or satisfying in finally getting more information on the abuse suffered by Johnny Depp. It‚Äôs just sad. 
 This could have been handled quietly through the courts but Heard chose to accuse Depp in a public fashion all while knowing it was either 100% false or at least that she was also a abuser herself to a high degree.  
  The second tape is very telling. Some ask why he didn‚Äôt deny what she was saying while she was saying it? Very likely because she won‚Äôt stop attacking for long enough for him to speak, I believe over years he is aware that anything he says will trigger her and he picks his words carefully. 
  You can hear it in the ‚Äúoh my god‚Äù comment. Like he‚Äôs  astonished by her view of things. 
 He says ‚ÄúAmber, do you believe this? Do you believe what your saying?‚Äù Again in a rather shocked way. 
  Finally he gets pissed and says that‚Äôs it! I‚Äôll see you in court. 
  He makes a very telling statement. 
  When she says she‚Äôs defending herself he says: ‚Äúyour defending yourself against things you said I did that I never did‚Äù!!
    He said this in anger after being very calm most of the time. 
  When someone is able to keep their calm while being under attack and then finally says something in a strong angry way it‚Äôs usually going to be from the gut. Very truthful.
